title: SMC_ABC_SLOPES_NO_STOP (Enum)
text:
TYPE SMC_ABC_SLOPES_NO_STOP :
Determines how
SMC_RecomputeABCSlopes
sets the slopes of A/B/C
at the transtion between two elements, when there is not stop.
Attributes:
qualified_only

rows.Name: SET_SMOOTH_CARDINAL
rows.Comment:
The slope at the end of element i is set as
(AddAxisValue(i+1) - AddAxisValue(i-1)) /
(ElementLength(i) + ElementLength(i+1)).
The slope at the start of element i+1 is set
to the same value.
